basics.name: Hanieh Mashayekhi
basics.title: IT Engineering Student
basics.summary: IT Engineering student applying for Backend Engineering Internship roles, with hands-on practice in Go, SQL, Git, Python, and Bash. I enjoy building reliable backend logic, improving developer workflows, and learning quickly in collaborative engineering teams. My Masters in Education strengthens my communication and cross-functional collaboration, and I am motivated to contribute to customer-facing systems in Zalando's recommerce domain.

details: Building core backend foundations in C programming, engineering mathematics, Python, and SQL, with focus on practical software and process development.
Actively participating in the intensive Kood Sisu program, focusing on Go, Bash scripting, Git/code review, and automation with strong emphasis on fast learning and collaborative development.
Provides advanced abilities in communication and teaching, perfect for collaborating effectively with non-technical shopfloor personnel and translating complex data insights.
2 years of volunteering in the tenant board, rewarded as the best tenant board in Finland.
Contributed as part of the project team.
One-day event to familiarize beginners with Python.
